content.question:

The mean map distance between gene <math alttext="R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>R</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and gene <math alttext="L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>L</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> is closest to which of the following?

skill.text: 5.A: Perform mathematical calculations, including: i. mathematical equations in the curriculum ii. means iii. rates iv. ratios v. percentages and percent changes
